root.name: Puzzlegeddon
root.description: Puzzlegeddon is a deathmatch type of game published by the swedish developer Pieces Interactive. You get to play a puzzle game in which you gather different resources that lets you use offensive or defensive abilities. You gain points if you manage to get the killing blow on another player. To get back in the game after you have been killed you will need to solve a challenge in the dead puzzler mode. There is also a single player aspect fo the game called Poison Peril. Here you will have to solve 80 challenges on a time and move limit. The game was originally released in 2008 for PC and was made available via different download services. In 2009 it was released on XBLA and Playstation Network.
